summary: This is a mod to be used with custom Vampire Lord armor and body replacers, it simply fixes the invisibility when going into Bats Form or Mist Form
descriptionHtml:
Introduction:
--------------------
This is a mod to be used with custom Vampire Lord armor and body replacers, it simply fixes the invisibility when going into Bats Form or Mist Form.


Usefulness:
----------------
Some mods that introduce new Vampire Lord Meshes face a bug in which mist Form and bats Form break. this mod intends to fix those without modifying anything vanilla.

Installation:
-------------------
i recommend using NMM, if you don\'t use it then just extract the archive and drop every file into your /data/ folder, then activate the .esp file coming with this mod (NMM does it automatically)

Uninstall:
----------------------
Delete all files again or use NMM.
author: Keldis
